alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 6:21PM EDT until August 08 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coffee County in southeastern Georgia... Atkinson County in southeastern Georgia... Northwestern Ware County in southeastern Georgia... Bacon County in southeastern Georgia... Northwestern Clinch County in southeastern Georgia... Jeff Davis County in southeastern Georgia... Northern Appling County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 621 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lumber City to near Nashville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Douglas, Baxley, Hazlehurst, Alma, Pearson, Willacoochee, Broxton, Ambrose, Graham, and Plant Hatch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Ware
